title: Boosting on farm nitrogen fixation in pulses  Liz Farquharson

tasks.task: Conducting agronomy research on pulse crops nitrogen fixation.
Plant pathology and crop health assessment.
Outreach and education related to pulse crop production.
subtasks: Evaluate different inoculation methods (e.g., using ourics) for their effectiveness in enhancing nitrogen fixation.
Assess the impact of inoculation timing (e.g., 10-12 weeks after sowing) on crop health and yield.
Compare the results of inoculated vs. non-inoculated crops to determine the most effective practices.
Develop new roseopia strains to enhance nitrogen fixation in pulses.
Study the agronomy of emerging pulse crop varieties (e.g., group EF pulses, vetch, chickpeas, lupins).
Collaborate with researchers, growers, and other stakeholders to advance pulse crop research and development.
